chapters.name: Units and Measurement
chapters.desc: NCERT Class 11 Physics Part 1 Chapter 1 Units and Measurement solutions. Units and Measurement, Significant Figures, Dimensional Analysis, Relative Motion.

chapters.name: Motion in a Straight Line
chapters.desc: NCERT Class 11 Physics Part 1 Chapter 2 Motion in a Straight Line solutions. Point Object and Motion, Position-Time Graphs, Equations of Motion, Motion Under Gravity, Velocity and Acceleration, Speed-Time Graphs.

chapters.name: Motion in a Plane
chapters.desc: NCERT Class 11 Physics Part 1 Chapter 3 Motion in a Plane solutions. Scalars and Vectors, Vector Operations, Vector Properties, Vector Inequalities, Vector Addition, Displacement.

chapters.name: Laws of Motion
chapters.desc: NCERT Class 11 Physics Part 1 Chapter 4 Laws of Motion solutions. Net Force and Equilibrium, Force and Acceleration, Force and Frames of Reference, Circular Motion, Newton's Second Law, Vector Addition of Forces.

chapters.name: Work, Energy and Power
chapters.desc: NCERT Class 11 Physics Part 1 Chapter 5 Work, Energy and Power solutions. Sign of Work, Work and Friction, Potential Energy and Turning Points, Simple Harmonic Motion, Energy Conservation, Energy Concepts.

chapters.name: Systems of Particles and Rotational Motion
chapters.desc: NCERT Class 11 Physics Part 1 Chapter 6 Systems of Particles and Rotational Motion solutions. Centre of Mass, Centre of Mass Motion, Cross Product, Scalar Triple Product, Angular Momentum, Angular Momentum Conservation.

chapters.name: Gravitation
chapters.desc: NCERT Class 11 Physics Part 1 Chapter 7 Gravitation solutions. Gravitational Concepts, Gravity Variations, Kepler's Third Law, Kepler's Third Law Application, Galactic Motion, Satellite Energy.
